nodes.text: Juri juice was a beverage served at Chalmun's Spaceport Cantina on the planet Tatooine. Some varieties of the drink contained the blood of the sentient Rodian species. The Arcona Hem Dazon spent all his credits on salt and juri juice while on Tatooine, and was particualrly fond of the Rodian blood variety despite the fact it turned his eyes yellow and made his hands shake.

Juri juice first appeared in the 2015 junior novel Smuggler's Run: A Han Solo & Chewbacca Adventure, written by Greg Rucka. According to a StarWars.com blog post, Hem Dazon was addicted to the beverage.
